description:
💎 Egg: Emby
⚙️ Version: 2.0
❓ What it is: In short, you can have your own Netflix. Emby is a media server designed to organize, play and stream video and audio to a variety of devices.
🐛 Bugs fixed/changelogs: 
 • How it's done Download has changed, now it will always install the latest version
 • Now Egg is not dependent on updates, everything is done by scripts, which causes at its best • Code is now cleaner.
 📦Docker:
 • Docker Updated (Dotnet Version: 6.0.13) 
 • Added ARM compatibility
 • Now there is no need to change between 64x and ARM64 Use image: ashu11a/emby:latest
⚠️ Aten 
👑 Author: Ashu

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt update
apt upgrade -y
apt install -y curl wget unzip git tar ca-certificates jq fuse unzip
bash <(curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Ashu11-A/Ashu_eggs/main/Connect/en/Emby/install.sh)
